EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize and Automate your SAP Testing - US/Canada - July 2014.Email -
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar Rescheduled] Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for registering for our webinar, “Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing.” This webinar has been rescheduled to a later date.
Previous Date:
Wednesday, July 9, 2014 10:00 am PDT / 1:00 pm PDT
New Date:
Tuesday, July 22, 2014 10:00 am PDT / 1:00 pm PDT
Please make a note of this. If you are unable to attend at this new time, you will receive a recording of the webinar.
You will be receiving a new confirmation email in the next few days.
Best wishes, The Tricentis Webinar Team
David Grassmugg Head of Test Automation and Management Vienna Insurance Group
Michael Hentze Vice President Engineering Tricentis
